label: A8BC3D6_hP18_189_agh_b_f_i-001
title: $\pi$-FeMg$_{3}$Al$_{8}$Si$_{6}$ ($E9_{b}$) Structure
comments: We have been unable to obtain a copy of (Perlitz, 1942), and use the data provided by (Brandes, 1992) and (Foss, 2003). Foss et al. argue that the actual composition of this phase should be FeMg$_{3}$Al$_{9}$Si$_{5}$. This requires a reordering of the atomic positions, as described in \href{current_web_home_dir/A9BC3D5_hP18_189_fi_a_g_bh-001}{A9BC3D5\_hP18\_189\_fi\_a\_g\_bh}.
